title: Deadpool
description: A fast-talking mercenary with a morbid sense of humor fights bad guys while breaking the fourth wall.

title: Deadpool 2
description: Foul-mouthed mutant mercenary Wade Wilson teams up with other mutants to protect a young boy.

title: The Shawshank Redemption
description: Two imprisoned men bond over several years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

title: Inception
description: A thief who enters the dreams of others is tasked with planting an idea in someone's subconscious.

title: The Dark Knight
description: Batman faces his toughest challenge yet: the anarchist Joker wreaks havoc in Gotham City.

title: Forrest Gump
description: The life journey of a man with low intelligence who achieves incredible things by chance.

title: Pulp Fiction
description: The intertwined lives of hitmen, a boxer, and mobsters unfold in a series of darkly comedic stories.

title: The Matrix
description: A computer hacker discovers the true nature of reality and joins a rebellion against machines.

title: Avengers: Endgame
description: The Avengers assemble one last time to reverse the damage caused by Thanos' snap.

title: Gladiator
description: A betrayed Roman general seeks revenge against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family.

title: Interstellar
description: A team of explorers travels through a wormhole in space to ensure humanity's survival.

title: Titanic
description: A love story unfolds on the ill-fated Titanic as it heads toward disaster.

title: The Lion King
description: A young lion prince learns about life, loss, and leadership as he reclaims his kingdom.

title: The Godfather
description: The story of the powerful Corleone mafia family and their rise to power.

title: Fight Club
description: A disillusioned man forms an underground fight club as a way of reclaiming his life.

title: Star Wars: A New Hope
description: A young farmer becomes a hero in a galaxy-wide rebellion against an evil empire.

title: Jurassic Park
description: Scientists create a theme park with living dinosaurs, which inevitably goes terribly wrong.

title: The Avengers
description: Earth's mightiest heroes come together to stop an alien invasion.

title: Coco
description: A boy accidentally enters the Land of the Dead and discovers his family's musical legacy.

title: The Wolf of Wall Street
description: The rise and fall of a wealthy stockbroker living a life of excess and corruption.
